duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct original research in the field of astrophysics under the guidance of the Associate Curator.
Publish original scientific results in journals and disseminate them to the scientific research community at conferences.
Provide service to the scientific community through reviews of papers and grants.
Participate in education and public outreach activities on a time-available basis.

education_certification.credential: Defended Ph.D. in Astrophysics with graduation pending.
